# Corvid's Cunning, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (feathers or droppings from a crow, raven or jackdaw)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 148

*Mass corvid’s cunning* works like *[[Corvid's Cunning (Spell)|corvid’s cunning]]*, except that it affects multiple creatures.
